title: Sylvia Park, Auckland Hoyts Event Showbags
body:
Hi,
So me and my friends went to the Sylvia Park, Auckland Hoyts event on Sunday 29th and asked about the showbags in which the organisers replied, "We have not recieved the showbags yet because of a delay and we will be sending it to you. It will arrive in about 1-2 days.". We filled out a form which included our address, name and phone number and we went on to watching the event. Its been about a week now and we still have not received our showbags. Can anyone help?

replies.body:
Hi SuperMini0n,
My name is Cameron "Crunch" and I was helping to run the event. I am very sorry to hear the bags have not been distributed to you yet after the hiccup with customs last Saturday. I will be following up with the Hoyts staff as they have control/responsibility for the postage and handling of them. I'll also see what I can do regarding skin codes for you as I know this is a huge selling point of attending these viewing parties. 

I sincerely apologize for the lack of communication here and regardless of the lack of *swag* on the day I hope you enjoyed the event! There will be a clearer line of communication between Riot/Hoyts/Myself to ensure that this error does not occur again. 

Really hoping they arrive for you soon!
Crunch

Hey SuperMini0n,

We are working with HOYTS to get the swag bags sent out asap. Will keep you updated in this thread.
